description: Koizumi Natsumi is a member of http://anidb.net/ch2350 [Otome]`s gang who are constantly mobbing their classmate http://anidb.net/ch2345 [Kotonoha]. More than others she enjoys tantalizing and manipulating her victim who`s easy to intimidate, and she`s never at a loss of snappish comments and other underhandedness. She takes advantage of Kotonoha`s weakness in order to terrorize her.
name: Koizumi Natsumi
